plot: Good and Evil clash in this dark suspense thriller when a maniacal serial killer leaves a string of victims who've been marked for death by their perceived bad behavior.
title: Abeo Pharisee
plot_es: Good and Evil clash in this dark suspense thriller when a maniacal serial killer leaves a string of victims who've been marked for death by their perceived bad behavior.
plot_en: Good and Evil clash in this dark suspense thriller when a maniacal serial killer leaves a string of victims who've been marked for death by their perceived bad behavior.
